gw.plugin.messaging

Interface MessageReply

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, MessagePlugin, java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    InboundIntegrationMessageReply, InboundIntegrationMessageReplyHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileIntegrationMessageReplyHandler, JMSIntegrationMessageReplyHandler

    public interface MessageReply
extends MessagePlugin
    Reply interface for messaging, used to supply a MessageFinder instance so that integration code can look up and acknowledge a message. The PluginCallbackHandler implementation supplied in initTools() is used to execute a block of code in a Guidewire-initiated transaction. Typically this will be used in conjunction with the MessageFinder instance to look up a message and call reportAck() on it.
    Author:
    jseybold

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Supplies an instance of PluginCallbackHandler and MessageFinder to the plugin.
